name: Hanna Gabriels
bio:
Hanna Gabriels, also known as "La Amazona," is a highly accomplished boxer with an impressive career spanning multiple weight classes. Born on January 14, 1983, Gabriels has made a name for herself in the world of boxing through her skill, determination, and undeniable talent. Standing at a height of 170cm with a reach of 173cm, she has proven herself to be a force to be reckoned with in the ring.

Known for her orthodox stance, Gabriels has competed in various weight classes throughout her career. Starting off as a Welterweight, she has also ventured into the Light Heavyweight and Heavyweight divisions. This versatility showcases her ability to adapt and thrive in different weight classes, a testament to her skill and dedication to the sport.

With over 20 years of experience in professional boxing, Gabriels has faced off against some of the toughest opponents in the ring. Her resilience and unwavering determination have led her to achieve numerous accomplishments and titles throughout her career.

One of her notable achievements includes becoming the World Boxing Association (WBA) Female Super Welterweight Champion in 2013. This victory solidified her position as one of the top boxers in her weight class, and she gained recognition for her exceptional boxing skills.

Throughout her career, Gabriels has captivated audiences with her explosive power and precise technique. Her punches are known to pack a punch, and her strategic approach to the sport sets her apart from her competitors. Watching Gabriels in the ring is like witnessing a perfectly choreographed dance, where every move is deliberate and calculated.

Gabriels' fighting style can be best described as a mix of power and finesse. Her punches are thrown with such force that they can leave her opponents reeling, yet she also possesses the agility and speed to evade incoming attacks. This combination of attributes makes her a formidable opponent and a fan favorite.

Outside of the ring, Gabriels is also an advocate for women's boxing and has been a vocal supporter of gender equality in the sport. She has paved the way for female athletes, proving that women can excel in traditionally male-dominated fields.

With her impressive track record and undeniable talent, Gabriels continues to make a lasting impact on the world of boxing. Her skill, resilience, and passion for the sport serve as an inspiration to aspiring boxers around the globe. As she continues to rise through the ranks, it is clear that Hanna Gabriels is a force to be reckoned with, leaving an indelible mark on the sport she loves.
